definition: to use/by means of/according to/in order to/because of/at (a certain date or place)
abbr. for Israel 以色列[Yi3 se4 lie4]
to send/to devote/to deliver/to cause/to convey
to go/to take/sentence-final interrogative particle/variant of 於|于[yu2]

sentences.english: He is so strong that he can lift the stone .
sentences.chinese: 他如此的强壮，以致于可以举起这块石头。

sentences.english: Slowly, the comfort create a rim of beer belly.
sentences.chinese: 以致于慢慢地养了一圈的脾酒肚。

sentences.english: I think we're so good that we'll be asked to play in the Olympic Games.
sentences.chinese: 我认为我们如此棒，以致于会被邀请去奥运会打比赛。

sentences.english: There are so many works of art that some of them must be stored away.
sentences.chinese: 罗浮宫的馆藏众多，以致于有些艺术品必须收存起来。

sentences.english: Some days I was too tied to get out of bed.
sentences.chinese: 有时候我太疲劳了以致于起不了床。

sentences.english: Our blood-sugar was falling so low that we frequently stumbled as we fought through the sucking mud.
sentences.chinese: 我们的血糖降得很低以致于我们不断在泥泞中跌倒。

sentences.english: All the maths problems on the test paper are difficult, so that I couldn't work out them all.
sentences.chinese: 试卷上的所有数学试题都很难，以致于我都做不出来。

sentences.english: There is very little gravity so that things float around.
sentences.chinese: 引力很小以致于东西飘来飘去。

sentences.english: She was too angry to say a word.
sentences.chinese: 她太生气了以致于说不出一句话。

sentences.english: He is too short to reach the door bell.
sentences.chinese: 他太矮以致于搆不到门铃。

sentences.english: So much have been given to me, I have no time to ponder over that which has been denied.
sentences.chinese: 我得到的太多，以致于再无时间去思考哪个是不好的。

sentences.english: The box is so heavy which I can'; t lift it.
sentences.chinese: 这个箱子太沉以致于我无法抬起来。

sentences.english: She smiled in such a way that Bob couldn't help liking heR.
sentences.chinese: 她如此的微笑，以致于包伯忍不住喜欢她。

sentences.english: He came so late that he missed the class.
sentences.chinese: 他来得如此晚，以致于误了一节课。

sentences.english: So beautiful is Xi Shi that we all like her。
sentences.chinese: 西施是如此美丽，以致于我们都喜欢她。

sentences.english: He is like a fool which he can't boil an egg.
sentences.chinese: 他是那样一个笨蛋，以致于连鸡蛋都不会煮。
